items.title: Review – Shelby Oaks (2025) hints at something different, but can’t keep its promises
bullets: • Shelby Oaks is a muddled, uneven experiment that never quite figures out what it wants to be
• It swings between cinematic sequences, faux-documentary interviews, and found-footage snippets with little sense of cohesion
• What starts as a promising premise erodes into a greatest-hits compilation of genre clichés

items.title: Review: Rian Johnson Pits Faith Against Facts in Thrilling Fashion in WAKE UP DEAD MAN

items.title: Warner Joins Forces With AI Song Generator, Suno, That It Was Suing
bullets: • Warner Music Group, one of the major labels that sued AI song generator Suno, has signed a licensing deal with the company
• The deal is designed to help Suno move toward a licensed model where users will pay to download songs made on its platform with artificial intelligence
• Suno has also acquired the concert listings Songkick, formerly owned by Warner, as part of the deal

items.title: At long last, the mystery of lightning on Mars is solved
bullets: • Mini-lightning strikes created by whirling dust devils on Mars have been detected accidentally by the Perseverance rover
• The chance discovery is direct evidence of a form of lightning on Mars, researchers say
• Lightning has proven more elusive on our closest planetary neighbors

• Despite a call from the state’s first-ever flood plan, it can be hard to secure funding ahead of a disaster

items.title: The origins of your dog's unique look may be older than you think
bullets: • By about 10,000 years ago, half of the amount of diversity present in modern dogs was already present in the Neolithic, researchers say
• The study was published in the journal Science
• It's commonly believed that this vast range in physical attributes is a product of the Victorian era

items.title: Texas adds new ID restrictions on vehicle registrations and renewals
bullets: • The Texas Department of Motor Vehicles is implementing more stringent photo identification requirements for all vehicle registrations and renewals
• Current photo identification, such as a state driver’s license or passport, must be presented when new vehicle registrations or renewals are made, according to the new policy
• The DMV said it informed county tax offices on Nov
• 18 of the new requirement, which went into effect immediately

• But how they can help kick an infection remains mysterious

items.title: Achieving lasting remission for HIV
bullets: • Around the world, some 40 million people are living with HIV
• Researchers have never been able to bring about a cure
• Instead, HIV-positive people must take a cocktail of antiretroviral drugs for the rest of their lives
• But in 2025, researchers reported a breakthrough that suggests a “functional” cure for HIV

items.title: Scientists discover hidden wolf DNA in most dogs
bullets: • Scientists discover hidden wolf DNA in most dogs
• Researchers studying thousands of canine genomes discovered that wolf DNA is still present in most dog breeds
• This ancient genetic influence shows up in traits like body size, behavior, and environmental resilience
• Even dogs bred far from wolves, including tiny chihuahuas, carry detectable wolf ancestry
